main_section_html:
Create Student

name: add-student
title: Add Student

javascript: document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);    const Student_Id = urlParams.get('studId');    if (Student_Id) {        frappe.call({            method: 'sage.sage.student_hooks.get_student',            args: { stud_id: Student_Id },            callback: function(response) {                if (response.message) {                  var studentDetails = response.message;                  document.getElementById('firstname').value = studentDetails.firstname || '';                                    document.getElementById('lastname').value = studentDetails.lastname || '';                                    document.getElementById('gender').value = studentDetails.gender || '';                                    document.getElementById('profile_img').value = studentDetails.profile_img || '';                }                else                {                  document.getElementById('firstname').value = '';                                    document.getElementById('lastname').value = '';                                    document.getElementById('gender').value = '';                                    document.getElementById('profile_img').value = '';                }            },        });    }});document.getElementById('updatestudent').onsubmit = function(e) {    debugger    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);    const Student_Id = urlParams.get('studId');    e.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default form submission        // Get form data    var formData = new FormData(this);    // Get individual form field values    var first_name = formData.get('firstname');    var last_name = formData.get('lastname');    var gender = formData.get('gender');    var img = formData.get('profile_img');        frappe.call({        method: 'sage.sage.student_hooks.update_student',        args: {            student_id:Student_Id,            firstname:first_name,            lastname:last_name,            gender:gender,            profile_img:img        },        callback: function(response) {        if (response.message) {          alert("success")        } else {                  }      }    });};
